message.body: Are you home right now?
No I'm working. Why what's up?
Oh nothing don't worry about it. I was gonna have you snap a picture of Richie's shoe collection. Still having trouble with all the boys. Christmas is hard on me.
I know it's cool. I understand. Richie has vans converse Jordan's n air max 95s. Just get them like a $15 gift card to game stop or the gallery or something.
Would u by chance happen to remember what I got Titi Elsea last year?
No but I can find out.

It's not a biggie I kinda have a good idea. I talked to Richie yesterday. He was supposed to spy on Gabe and come up with gifts for me but he's slacking. Rrrrr! Ideas are so hard! I hate giving gift cards tho. They seem impersonal. ...but if it's my only option, I'll do it as a last resort.
Well they won't mind they actually prefer it but they really like ur gifts. We were talking bout it the other day. They said they love it cause they r always
out the box.
Titi said she wants a toaster. She just texted me .
A toaster or toaster oven?
A toaster.
What size shoes are they?
Gabe is 8 n richie 9
I'll look for a toaster. I actually saw a really sweet pretty vintage one the other day.
Ok:)
Yeah those
Yeah
How u making out?
So so. Still haven't gotten them anything but I got some ideas at least. I got Titi some pairs of fluffy socks the other day just a add to whatever else. I'm still lost with Jaden.
Jayden likes video games now. We got him a ds for Xmas so u can get him a game for that for like 20 bucks or something. He got 2 games so far angry birds n
Mario. He's 4 so something easy or cute. He's not picky
